sqlMap.select: SELECT acm.APNTC_SN FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP acm WHERE acm.APNTC_SN = (SELECT MAX(APNTC_SN) FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin# AND REG_FLAG='N')

SELECT acm.PHOTO , acm.PHOTO_NM
FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP acm WHERE acm.APNTC_SN = (SELECT MAX(APNTC_SN) FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin#)
AND REG_FLAG = #regFlag#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT KIPADM.APNTC_CPA_MYP_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM dual
MERGE INTO APNTC_CPA_MYP USING DUAL ON (PIN = #pin# AND APNTC_SN = #apntcSn#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET AGREE_INFO1_YN = #agreeInfoYn1#, AGREE_INFO2_YN = #agreeInfoYn2#, AGREE_INFO3_YN = #agreeInfoYn3#, KOREAN_NM = #koreanNm#, BRTHDY = #brthdy#, LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (APNTC_SN, PIN, AGREE_INFO1_YN, AGREE_INFO2_YN, AGREE_INFO3_YN, KOREAN_NM, BRTHDY, FRST_REGIST_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDT_ID, LAST_UPDT_DT)
VALUES (#mypApntcSn#, #pin#, #agreeInfoYn1#, #agreeInfoYn2#, #agreeInfoYn3#, #koreanNm#, #brthdy#, #userId#, SYSTIMESTAMP, #userId#, SYSTIMESTAMP)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE APNTC_CPA_MYP SET PHOTO = #pictFileId# , PHOTO_NM = #photoNm# , LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId# , LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE PIN = #pin# AND APNTC_SN = #apntcSn#

UPDATE APNTC_CPA_MYP SET PHOTO = (SELECT PHOTO FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin# AND REG_FLAG ='F' AND APNTC_SN = (SELECT MAX(APNTC_SN) FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin# AND REG_FLAG ='F')) , PHOTO_NM = (SELECT PHOTO_NM FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin# AND REG_FLAG ='F' AND APNTC_SN = (SELECT MAX(APNTC_SN) FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin# AND REG_FLAG ='F')) , LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId# , LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE PIN = #pin# AND APNTC_SN = #apntcSn#

UPDATE APNTC_CPA_MYP SET VACATION_STR_DE = #vacationStrDe# , VACATION_END_DE = #vacationEndDe# , GRDT_SATAUS = #grdtSataus# , GRDT_DE = #grdtDe# , LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId# , LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE PIN = #pin# AND APNTC_SN = #apntcSn#

UPDATE APNTC_CPA_MYP SET APP_REGIST_DE = #appRegistDe#, GUIDE_CPA_NM = #guideCpaNm#, GUIDE_CPA_NO = #guideCpaNo#, APP_INSTT_NM = #appInsttNm#, APP_INSTT_CD = #appInsttCd#, APNTC_CL = #apntcCl#, APP_INSTT_ETC = #appInsttEtc#, LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE PIN = #pin# AND APNTC_SN = #apntcSn#

UPDATE APNTC_CPA_MYP SET ATCH_FILE_ID1 = #atchFileId1#, ATCH_FILE_ID2 = #atchFileId2#, ATCH_FILE_ID3 = #atchFileId3#, ATCH_FILE_ID4 = #atchFileId4#, PASS_CRTI_FILE_ID = #passCrtiFileId#, EMPL_CRTI_FILE_ID = #emplCrtiFileId#, RSUM_FILE = #rsumFileId#, RSUM_FILE_NM = #rsumFileNm#, EVENTN = #eventn#,
LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE PIN = #pin# AND APNTC_SN = #apntcSn#

UPDATE APNTC_CPA_MYP SET ATCH_FILE_ID1 = #atchFileId1#, ATCH_FILE_ID2 = #atchFileId2#, ATCH_FILE_ID3 = #atchFileId3#, ATCH_FILE_ID4 = #atchFileId4#, PASS_CRTI_FILE_ID = #passCrtiFileId#, EMPL_CRTI_FILE_ID = #emplCrtiFileId#, RSUM_FILE = (SELECT RSUM_FILE FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin# AND REG_FLAG ='F' AND APNTC_SN = (SELECT MAX(APNTC_SN) FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin# AND REG_FLAG ='F')), RSUM_FILE_NM = (SELECT RSUM_FILE_NM FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin# AND REG_FLAG ='F' AND APNTC_SN = (SELECT MAX(APNTC_SN) FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin# AND REG_FLAG ='F')), EVENTN = (SELECT EVENTN FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin# AND REG_FLAG ='F' AND APNTC_SN = (SELECT MAX(APNTC_SN) FROM APNTC_CPA_MYP WHERE PIN = #pin# AND REG_FLAG ='F')),
LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE PIN = #pin# AND APNTC_SN = #apntcSn#

UPDATE APNTC_CPA_MYP SET REG_FLAG = #regFlag#, OPETR_DE = #opetrDe#, LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE PIN = #pin# AND APNTC_SN = #apntcSn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CPA c LEFT JOIN MBER_INDVDLINFO mi on mi.PIN = c.PIN WHERE c.CPA_ID = #guideCpaNo# AND mi.KOREAN_NM = #guideCpaNm# and c.CANCL_CL is null
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MBER_PHOTO SET LAST_YN ='Y', LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE PTG_TRG_ID = #pin# AND LAST_YN = 'N'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MBER_PHOTO( PTG_SN, PTG_TRG_ID, PHOTO, LAST_YN, FRST_REGIST_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDT_ID, LAST_UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( KIPADM.MBER_PHOTO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #pin#, #pictFileId#, #lastYn#, #userId#, SYSTIMESTAMP, #userId#, SYSTIMESTAMP )
sqlMap.select: SELECT mp.PTG_SN, mp.PTG_TRG_ID, mp.PHOTO, mp.LAST_YN FROM MBER_PHOTO mp WHERE mp.LAST_YN = 'N' AND mp.PTG_TRG_ID = #pin#
